articles.title: World Scientists Look Elsewhere as U.S. Labs Stagger Under Trump Cuts
articles.description: With the welcome mat withdrawn for promising researchers from around the world, America is at risk of losing its longstanding pre-eminence in the sciences.
articles.content:
For decades, Bangalore, India, has been an incubator for scientific talent, sending newly minted Ph.D.s around the world to do groundbreaking research. In an ordinary year, many aim their sights at labs in the United States.
“These are our students, ... [963 chars]

articles.title: Polish presidential candidates neck and neck on eve of runoff vote
articles.description: National tensions over future of Poland play out in Siekierczyn, where a single vote determined the first round
articles.content:
Poles will cast their votes on Sunday in the closest presidential runoff since the fall of communism, in an election that pits two different visions of the nation against each other.
In Poland’s previous election in 2020, the conservative populist in... [7159 chars]

articles.title: A Canadian prairie city virtually deserted as fires rage and thousands more evacuees expected
articles.description: Manitoba's premier says the Canadian prairie city of Flin Flon hasbeen virtually deserted and more evacuees were expected as wildfires raged in the province.
articles.content:
WINNIPEG, Manitoba (AP) — The Canadian prairie city of Flin Flon was virtually deserted and more evacuees were expected, Manitoba’s premier said Friday, as wildfires raged in the province.
Premier Wab Kinew told a news conference that the mayor, coun... [4073 chars]

articles.title: 'I want the right to go out with them'
articles.description: Videos featuring emotional moments between "reborn mothers" and their hyper-realistic baby dolls have sparked both online fascination and political debate in Brazil, with lawmakers even bringing the lifelike dolls into legislatures.
articles.content:
SAO PAULO — Videos featuring emotional moments with hyper-realistic baby dolls have sparked both online fascination and political debate in Brazil, with lawmakers even bringing the lifelike dolls into legislatures.

articles.title: In Moscow Subway Station, Stalin Again Draws Admirers
articles.description: After nearly 60 years underground, a statue of Joseph Stalin now greets commuters in a Moscow subway station, reigniting debate over how Russia remembers its most polarizing...

articles.title: Gaza food aid decays in Jordan warehouses : NPR
articles.description: Food aid is moldering in warehouses in Jordan, the main hub for humanitarian aid to Gaza. Other foods and medicines are loaded on trucks that have waited for months at Israeli border crossings.
articles.content:
Food for Gaza decays in Jordan warehouses as Israel restricts aid
toggle caption Abed Rahim/Anadolu via Getty Images

articles.title: Opposition and scandals: The curious relationship of Emmanuel and Brigitte Macron
articles.description: Viral video of Brigitte Macron slapping her husband reignites transgender slander and questions about their marriage; couple faces legal battles against conspiracies over their 25-year age gap and controversial teacher-student relationship origins

articles.title: Trump offers Emmanuel Macron marriage advice after slap by wife Brigitte
articles.description: "Make sure the door remains closed," Trump chuckled in response to a question about the stunning video of Madame Macron's assault on her husband Sunday night.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON — President Trump offered up a tip for France’s first family to preserve domestic tranquility after his Paris counterpart Emmanuel Macron was publicly slapped by his wife Brigitte on a foreign trip earlier this week.

articles.title: Israeli military evacuates 250k Palestinians from Jabalya
articles.description: According to testimonies from soldiers in the field, Thursday night was one of the most intense since the beginning of the operation.
articles.content:
More than 250,000 Palestinians were evacuated from Jabalya to the shelter area in the past few hours, security sources said on Friday.

articles.title: I’m Victim of ‘Criminal’ Sex Tapes Leak
articles.description: Glenn Greenwald, who won a Pulitzer Prize, reveals his intimate “financial domination” tape has been leaked.
articles.content:
